type.parameterCount: Instructions no good.... Explain more clearly to Peon.
type.orc.none: You do not command any warparties. You should conquer a war party!
type.orc.notavailable: Peon cannot get to any warparties in the wargroup. Have they been raised to the ground?
type.orc.dne: There is no warparty by that name in your wargroup.
type.srv.dne: The requested warcamp does not exist. Confirm your warcamps.

type.bad.code: Me not sure what happened. The maker didn prepare Peon for this.
